attributes.title: This app is terrible
attributes.review: This app took 7 hours to download , and not to mention that every time I got on the app it would glitch to a orange face 🟧 . This app almost killed my dog 😢,my dog came around me while I tried using the app and when it glitches to a orange face my dog got scared and had a seizure 😓😤 , so my sister wanted to see why the dog had a seizure , so I showed her how it would glitch to an orange face  🍊 she got so scared and horrified that she ran away , she still hasn’t came back , and last but no least my phone over heated because of the app , I had to buy a new one , so I was using the app and the app was glitching way too much and I noticed that eveytime a orange face 🟠 shows it would get hotter

attributes.title: On behalf of kids in America
attributes.review: As soon as I opens the app it gave me chills and a stomach ache, and this country is the for the free,And the home of the brave and yet there are human in cages and police over using there power. I’m just saying he claims he is Presbyterian, so then why do u think whites have more power than other ethnicity’s we all originally came from Africa and if anyone was odd one out it was Caucasians. I don’t have anything against caucasians or blacks or any ethnicity’s.  Not saying that Caucasians don’t work hard but in America other ethnicity’s have a harder in this country,But yet trump tells people to go to their country , he does not own this country. I’m a proud bi-racial child that thinks all should be treated equally!!

attributes.title: I hate it🦋✨🧚‍♀️💗😌
attributes.review: This app is the worst thing I think that has ever come about human existence. I showed it to my whole family and now they’re all blind so thanks for that😨👄💀🦋I’ll be sending you the medical pills plus therapy ones for PTSD👌🎉🦋🧚‍♀️✨. I feel like if I were to get run over by a semi truck, then forced into a pit of acid, then strangled by a snake, and then on top of that  had to eat ghost peppers for an hour, I think I’d be better off then having to look at this app 😉😁😍💗👄💗What was even the point? You should quit ✨✌️👄🧚‍♀️ legit no one likes you like no one at all. This app killed the rest of my brain cells and now I can’t stop running in circles✨😁😁🤨😂🦋🧚‍♀️ anyway!! Goodnightttt and thank u for listening!!

attributes.title: my experiences 🥵
attributes.review:
VERY UNPLEASANT EXPERIENCE!! i was peacefully scrolling through instagram when the app opened on its own and gave threats to me and the fam. then my phone proceeds to get very overheated and actually catch on fire. the smell was so bad that it killed off all the kids in my basement. RIP to those kids. then all the rats and bugs came up from god knows where to check out the scene. as all this is going down my pizza rolls burnt in the oven!! 😡 after this experience i will not be on the orange side of politics anymore 🟧🟠 it’s really a shame because i bought tickets the that rally but had to save my fish from drowning so i couldn’t attend but hope
it all went well! 
                                                XOXO- 👁👄👁

attributes.title: Thoroughly disappointed😪
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app, my cat seized out, maybe it was just a coincidence? I could not have had a worse experience with this app- as soon as my finger hit the “get” button, all of my face masks disappeared! It’s okay though because my president’s henchmen have informed me that the coronavirus is just a hoax, and now I don’t have to worry about not being able to breath because of a silly face mask. 🥰 I guess it’s just natural selection, but I’ve been educated so much. I also learned that white privilege doesn’t actually exist!!  Also- racism isn’t a thing any more, yay! 🥳 I guess we can all go home now and stop peacefully protesting because orange man fixed everything.❤️

attributes.title: Horrible🙈😒Disgusting🤢Ignorant😔🥱
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to support the president💕✨😃 turns out he’s a fascist bigot and extremely racist, sexist, and homophobic😔😞so disappointing. A soon as I opened the app, my screen was flooded with false information, glitches, offensive sights, and poor quality. I’m quite certain that I could design a better app for Trump, but am I gonna? Haha no. He doesn’t deserve my time😊 Anyway, don’t download this app, I think my device almost got hacked because of it! Most likely a trap. Very useless, not helpful at all. I would highly recommend another app called Tik-- oh wait, the president wants to delete that one!😱😳 Oh well. 0/10, would not recommend this one, guys.

attributes.title: horrific!!!!!!!
attributes.review:
it took 4 hours to download and i have good wifi and my storage isn’t even near full!!!!! and when i opened that app it kept glitching and all i could see what this big orange tangerine with hay on the top!!!!! after having it opened for a minute or two my phone crashed!!! it turned completely off! and when it turned back on my lock and home screen was turned into the glitchy tangerine with the hay on the top!!!! and i was confused so i closed the app and re opened it! and after i open it i see a picture of "the annoying orange" dressed up as a business man!!!! and audio was playing and it just kept repeating "china china china china" and the "annoying orange"s laugh in the background! and my phone started to heat up a lot so i had to close out of the app! but the audio was still playing!!!!!?????? i had to restart my phone again for it to stop, i could never get past the loading screen because of all of this nonsense!!!! 
0/10, would not eat here again even if it made me a millionaire 
:(

attributes.title: THIS APP STINKS
attributes.review: i tried to download this app and it took 2 WEEKS AND 5 DAYS. finally after i downloaded it it played this horrible music that i couldn’t turn off. then it asked for personal information like my address and credit card! but i gave it and then all my money on my credit card was gone and the money was spent on electronics! but this is the worst part and im crying typing this. somebody broke into my house without me knowing and put a bomb in it! luckily after he left i defused it and then called the cops. they said that i signed up for this and told me if i called the cops again they would torture me because im BLACK!! dont download this app because it is cursed and it will ruin your life.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I got this app, looking for reasons why I should vote for our terrible president again. And I found nothing good, bunker boy needs to LEAVE I’m soooooo done with him. Do you know how embarrassing it is to say you used to believe and support that loser, it’s not pleasant. I feel soooo incredibly stupid to have that he was gonna make America great again but he has done the opposite. And for all the idiots who say he isn’t racist, how about you try reading, and download twitter. He is one of the dumbest people I have ever heard of, you would think that someone would tell him to shut up, but no he just has to make life worse. Anyways, don’t download this app if you have any brain cells left. “LITERALLY ANYONE BUT TRUMP 2024!!!!!🇺🇸”
